title: Bug 120693Contribution: More Efficient Lint Warnings: ~15% Performance Increase
description: Bug 120693Contribution: More Efficient Lint Warnings: ~15% Performance Increase This alone saves about 15% of total CPU time in start up on my sample configuration.
OB: In profiling a loadtime weaving configuration from HEAD, I found that 9% of total time (over 10% of weaving time) is spent in org.aspectj.weaver.Lint.clearSuppressions(), mostly from use inside BcelClassWeaver.matchI made a small change in the parts of BcelAdvice that clear suppressions to save the list that was cleared and to only clear these.
